title: Rename music button label to “For You”

requirements.text: Update the music player UI so the user-facing label for the music button is renamed to exactly “For You”. This should apply anywhere the music button text is displayed (e.g., collapsed/floating button label and any related toggle/button text in the music player component).

quotes: rename music button to For You

acceptanceCriteria: The music button label displays exactly “For You” (matching capitalization and spacing).
No other UI text is unintentionally changed.
The music player continues to function normally (play/pause, volume, mute, and audio-source behavior remain unchanged).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not edit immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
nonGoals: Adding new tracks or changing the configured audio source (VITE_HUM_TERE_PYAAR_MEIN_AUDIO_SRC).
Changing the Valentine site theme, layout, or navigation behavior beyond updating the music button label.
